Hi Leigh,

I hope you're doing well!

It seems there is an error with the connection. Can you try a different method instead, connecting it via API key? Please see the below:
https://hammerhire.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=sby-feed-builder



  1. Go to Google Cloud Console
    • Visit: https://console.cloud.google.com/
  2. Create a New Project
    • Click the project dropdown in the top-left.
    • Click New Project.
    • Give it a name (e.g., Smash Balloon YouTube Integration), then click Create.
  3. Enable the YouTube Data API v3
    • From the dashboard, click + Enable APIs and Services.
    • Search for YouTube Data API v3.
    • Select it, then click Enable.
  4. Create Credentials
    • After enabling the API, click Create Credentials.
    • Choose YouTube Data API v3, then Public Data.
    • Click Next and your API key will be generated.
  5. Restrict Your API Key (Recommended)
    • Click Restrict Key.
    • Under Application restrictions, select HTTP referrers.
    • Add your domain (e.g., https://yourwebsite.com/* ).
    • Save your changes.
  6. Add the API Key to Smash Balloon Plugin
    • In your WordPress dashboard, go to YouTube Feed > Settings > Configure.
    • Paste the API key into the API Key field and save.

More detail here: Smash Balloon YouTube API Key Guide

Let me know if you need an hand, we can do screenshare if it helps.
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Leigh,

Here is quick video run through: https://www.loom.com/share/f73ed42c27de40599bd57334071ee4db

  1. Log In
    • Go to: https://hammerhire.com.au/manager
      Login credentials:
      • Email: sales@hammerhire.com.au
      • Password: akZTkJc5ebNBQ)r8Meh7fxJp
  1. Access Feed Builder
    • Visit: https://hammerhire.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=sby-feed-builder
  1. Connect YouTube Channel
    • Click "All Feeds" > "Add New"
    • Select "Channel"
    • Choose "Connect a YouTube account instead"
    • Click "Connect YouTube Through Google"
    • Choose the correct Google account that manages the YouTube channel
    • Click Continue

Let me know if you get into any issues.

  5. Select Account that has the youtube channel
  6. Click Continue
